name: Fortnite: Transformers Pack
summary:
Roll out, Rise up, or Beep Beep with the Fortnite Transformers Pack! Physical copies of this Pack will roll out at retail starting October 13, and digital copies will be available in digital stores starting October 21.

This new Pack includes:
- 3 New Outfits
- 3 New Back Blings
- 3 New Pickaxes
- 2 New Emotes
- 1,000 V-Bucks
